form.label: DfE FOUNDATIONAL SERVICES : CONTROLS DASHBOARD
form.description: Service Security Posture Hardening Programme : v1.01

search.query:
`ssphp_metrics_index` ssphp.use_case.id="$tkn_foundational_system$*" ssphp.use_case.display.short_description!="OVERALL SCORE" [| search `ssphp_metrics_index` | stats max(SSPHP_RUN) as SSPHP_RUN by ssphp.use_case.id | eval search_text="(\"ssphp.use_case.id\"=\"".'ssphp.use_case.id'."\" AND SSPHP_RUN=\"".SSPHP_RUN."\")" | stats values(search_text) as search_text | eval search_text="(".mvjoin(search_text," OR ").")" | return $$search_text] | table ssphp.use_case.display.title, ssphp.use_case.control, ssphp.use_case.id, ssphp.use_case.description, ssphp.score.score, ssphp.score.numerator, ssphp.score.denominator, ssphp.color, ssphp.use_case.treshhold.green, ssphp.use_case.treshhold.orange, ssphp.use_case.treshhold.red, ssphp.use_case.scoring_narrative, ssphp.use_case.framework.mitre, ssphp.use_case.framework.ig_1, ssphp.use_case.framework.ig_2, ssphp.use_case.framework.ig_3 | sort 0 ssphp.use_case.display.title
| rename ssphp.use_case.display.title as "Control ID", ssphp.use_case.id as "Use Case ID", ssphp.use_case.display.short_description as "Short Description", ssphp.use_case.description as "Description", ssphp.use_case.control as "Control", ssphp.score.score as "Score", ssphp.score.numerator as "Numerator", ssphp.score.denominator as "Denominator", ssphp.color as "Color", ssphp.use_case.treshhold.green as "Green Threshhold", ssphp.use_case.treshhold.orange as "Orange Threshhold", ssphp.use_case.treshhold.red as "Red Threshhold", ssphp.use_case.scoring_narrative as "Scoring Narrative", ssphp.use_case.framework.mitre as "Mitre", ssphp.use_case.framework.ig_1 as "IG1", ssphp.use_case.framework.ig_2 as "IG2", ssphp.use_case.framework.ig_3 as "IG3"
